reviews.review: Makes me want to break my computer every time I play but its fun overall
Amazing game but not comparable to the og 1.7 version
like crack but FPS title. You'll lose your mind to it, you'll have one hell of a right hand though

Its good if you want to spend way to much money on cosmetic items to look cool. Gameplay is fun if you get lucky enough to not be in a match with cheaters/hackers. gun recoil can be memorized and strategy is encouraged so always remember to rush B

Do NOT pay to play this game. Without paying the $20 to play Prime CS:GO, you will likely be in a full lobby of cheaters.. I thought that getting prime would fix this problem. I was veryyyy wrong though. I've played about 12 or 13 Prime competitive matches and I've had the pleasure of playing against hackers in 7 of those games. As you can probably imagine, this game is NOT a good time. Again... DO NOT PAY FOR THIS PRIME BULLSHIT

Edit: If you want to play this game and play with / against hackers as little as possible, you should go to Faceit and find matches there. Faceit has its own anti-cheat that I find is far better than VAC.
Best online shooter franchise in history.
